column4: when I plug in headphones the sound output doesn't stop from the speakers, instead it plays through both the headphones and speakers!
is there a way to get this to switch over automatically?
has anyone else experienced this issue when using headphones?
When I plug a pair of headphones into my Toshiba Satellite pro laptop the sound through the speakers doesn't switch off, instead sound plays through both the speakers and the headphones
This doesn't happen in windows xp and therefore must be a driver problem, does anyone have any experience with this kind of problem?
I think it uses an intel sound card
I was going to tell you to check the BIOS settings but, uh, yeah, I'm stumped
I can manually switch off the speakers by mutting "front" in the volume preferences
it's just that automatic switching between speakers and headphones which doesn't work
but doesn't that also mute the headphones?
no, to do that I have to mute "PCM"
I had a similar problem with my thinkpad, but can't remember how I fixed it. sorry! have you tried a quick google?
